name: Proposed Manchester Ship Canal Map (c.1882)
description: Map depicting the proposed Manchester Ship Canal with district and British Isles maps, sections and plans. Printed for Henry Boddington, Strangeways Brewery.
notes:
IIIF: https://www.digitalcollections.manchester.ac.uk/iiif/PR-C-00017-00041-00025
Image: https://image.digitalcollections.manchester.ac.uk/iiif/PR-C-00017-00041-00025-000-00001.jp2
Ship Canal proposed ~1882, opened 1894. Wider bounds covering canal route to Mersey.
